CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Estimating the Cost of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for Exchange Online, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, OneDrive and EndPoint
CurrentVersion.description: With OCR cost estimator, without incurring any bill and without providing azure subscription, admins will be able to estimate how much they will pay once they turn “ON” the OCR configuration for the selected locations and scope.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Estimating the Cost of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for Exchange Online, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, OneDrive and EndPoint
OldVersion.description: With OCR cost estimator, without incurring any bill and without providing azure subscription, admins will be able to estimate how much they will pay once they turn “ON” the OCR configuration for the selected locations and scope.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Sort search results by ratings
CurrentVersion.description: Users can sort in-app search results by ratings and relevance of the content.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Sort search results by ratings
OldVersion.description: Users can sort in-app search results by ratings and relevance of the content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Viva App Bar integration in Viva Learning Webapp
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Learning Webapp will have an easy way to switch across other Viva Webapp modules.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Viva App Bar integration in Viva Learning Webapp
OldVersion.description: Viva Learning Webapp will have an easy way to switch across other Viva Webapp modules.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Spell check in Viva Learning search
CurrentVersion.description: User queries will be spell checked and corrected for all in-app Search.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Spell check in Viva Learning search
OldVersion.description: User queries will be spell checked and corrected for all in-app Search.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) trainable classifiers
CurrentVersion.description: Leverage trainable classifiers from Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) to recognize various content types specific to your organization. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) trainable classifiers
OldVersion.description: Leverage trainable classifiers from Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) to recognize various content types specific to your organization. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Global exclusions
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, all exclusion features currently found under intelligent detections will be relocated to a new tab labeled "Global exclusions" within the insider risk settings. All previously added exclusions in intelligent detections will be migrated to this new tab.
The functionality of exclusions remains unchanged. Moreover, admins with appropriate permissions can now add exclusion via defined detection groups, which contain similar entities like domains or file types. This new tab is designed to enhance usability and offers a convenient way to access and manage exclusions.
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Global exclusions
OldVersion.description:
With this update, all exclusion features currently found under intelligent detections will be relocated to a new tab labeled "Global exclusions" within the insider risk settings. All previously added exclusions in intelligent detections will be migrated to this new tab.
The functionality of exclusions remains unchanged. Moreover, admins with appropriate permissions can now add exclusion via defined detection groups, which contain similar entities like domains or file types. This new tab is designed to enhance usability and offers a convenient way to access and manage exclusions.
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning – Multilayer structuring, customization, and branding for learning academies
CurrentVersion.description: This feature set brings new functionality to learning academies. Multi-layer structuring allows users to organize content and learning paths under multiple levels. Branding capabilities include the customization of the academy logo and the background image. Customization allows users to hide or show individual components of an academy like featured sets and  learner profile cards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning -  Use the Egress API to access all “My Learning” records
CurrentVersion.description: The Egress API can be used by learners to view their My Learning records and corresponding course details.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning -  Use the Egress API to access all “My Learning” records
OldVersion.description: The Egress API can be used by learners to view their My Learning records and corresponding course details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Add links to content in featured set
CurrentVersion.description: Global administrators/knowledge administrators can now add links to content sets in Viva Learning. These links can direct users to content stored internally with services like SharePoint and Stream or found online through YouTube, Vimeo, and other sources. The capability to add links to content allows admins to add content found online to featured sets, in addition to formal learning courses from connected providers.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Add links to content in featured set
OldVersion.description: Global administrators/knowledge administrators can now add links to content sets in Viva Learning. These links can direct users to content stored internally with services like SharePoint and Stream or found online through YouTube, Vimeo, and other sources. The capability to add links to content allows admins to add content found online to featured sets, in addition to formal learning courses from connected providers.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Schedule from email with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Often you may want to transition a conversation from an email thread to a meeting. Copilot helps you do this by being able to start scheduling right from the email conversation. It saves you time and effort by generating a meeting invite that's ready for you to review and send. When you click on "Schedule with Copilot" a meeting form will appear with a Copilot generated meeting title, agenda, and conversation summary as well as a pre-filled attendee list from the email thread and an attachment of the original email thread. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows, web, Mac, and mobile. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Schedule from email with Copilot
OldVersion.description: Often you may want to transition a conversation from an email thread to a meeting. Copilot helps you do this by being able to start scheduling right from the email conversation. It saves you time and effort by generating a meeting invite that's ready for you to review and send. When you click on "Schedule with Copilot" a meeting form will appear with a Copilot generated meeting title, agenda, and conversation summary as well as a pre-filled attendee list from the email thread and an attachment of the original email thread. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows, web, Mac, and mobile. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Customize your Viva Connections experiences with fonts and themes
CurrentVersion.description:
Site owners and operators will now be able to create branded fonts and themes for their sites and experiences in the brand center by combining the branding assets that the organization provides or by creating their own. 

This feature has been cancelled at this time. We apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Customize your Viva Connections experiences with fonts and themes
OldVersion.description: Site owners and operators will now be able to create branded fonts and themes for their sites and experiences in the brand center by combining the branding assets that the organization provides or by creating their own.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive for Business available in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Users can find and use the OneDrive app in classic Outlook for Windows, for a consistent and fast experience.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive for Business available in classic Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Users can find and use the OneDrive app in classic Outlook for Windows, for a consistent and fast experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Date and numeral standardization
CurrentVersion.description: All the dates that appear in Viva Learning will match the layout local to the user. This also applies to standardization of numerals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Date and numeral standardization
OldVersion.description: All the dates that appear in Viva Learning will match the layout local to the user. This also applies to standardization of numerals.

CurrentVersion.description: This gives users the ability to remove the recommendations which they do not need in the Recommended to you section.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove recommendations in Recommended to You
OldVersion.description: This gives users the ability to remove the recommendations which they do not need in the Recommended to you section.

CurrentVersion.description: Users can remove learning objects shown in the In-progress section.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove learning objects shown in In-progress section
OldVersion.description: Users can remove learning objects shown in the In-progress section.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows - Search tasks using Microsoft To Do
CurrentVersion.description: Search across your tasks lists using the Microsoft To Do module in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows - Search tasks using Microsoft To Do
OldVersion.description: Search across your tasks lists using the Microsoft To Do module in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Restrict unintentional sharing to unallowed cloud apps and services (macOS)
CurrentVersion.description: Ability to restrict unintentional sharing of sensitive items to unallowed cloud apps and services in macOS.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Restrict unintentional sharing to unallowed cloud apps and services (macOS)
OldVersion.description: Ability to restrict unintentional sharing of sensitive items to unallowed cloud apps and services in macOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Granular exclusion
CurrentVersion.description: Granular exclusion allows admins to adjust and fine tune indicators according to organizational preferences to help tailor the detection of risks that may lead to a potential security incident. For example, admins can configure the indicator “sending email with attachments to recipients outside the organization” to only detect emails sent to personal domains (e.g. outlook.com). In that way, admins can reduce the number of false positives. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Granular exclusion
OldVersion.description: Granular exclusion allows admins to adjust and fine tune indicators according to organizational preferences to help tailor the detection of risks that may lead to a potential security incident. For example, admins can configure the indicator “sending email with attachments to recipients outside the organization” to only detect emails sent to personal domains (e.g. outlook.com). In that way, admins can reduce the number of false positives. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of webinars to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Webinars
OldVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of webinars to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Town Halls
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of town halls to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Town Halls
OldVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of town halls to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Attach files from SharePoint Sites in the mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to browse, multiselect and attach files from SharePoint Sites to a chat or channel conversation in the mobile app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Attach files from SharePoint Sites in the mobile app
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to browse, multiselect and attach files from SharePoint Sites to a chat or channel conversation in the mobile app.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Find your files faster than ever with a new and improved search experience in OneDrive Web
CurrentVersion.description: OneDrive for web now lets you find your files faster than ever with a new and improved search functionality. Say goodbye to the days of endlessly scrolling through folders to find that one elusive document. With our latest update, locating your files is now faster and more intuitive than ever before. Whether it's in your personal OneDrive, shared folders, or document libraries, our improved search feature allows you to seamlessly sift through your digital workspace from one centralized location. We've added new filters for different file types, ensuring you can pinpoint exactly what you're looking for and with the date filter, you can narrow down your search results to find files created or modified within a specific timeframe. We understand that searching within a folder or document library is important to you, and for that, we have simplified scoping options that will enable precise searches within folders, sites, or document libraries. We've also visually updated the interface with more metadata, ensuring you effortlessly identify the right files every time.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Find your files faster than ever with a new and improved search experience in OneDrive Web
OldVersion.description: OneDrive for web now lets you find your files faster than ever with a new and improved search functionality. Say goodbye to the days of endlessly scrolling through folders to find that one elusive document. With our latest update, locating your files is now faster and more intuitive than ever before. Whether it's in your personal OneDrive, shared folders, or document libraries, our improved search feature allows you to seamlessly sift through your digital workspace from one centralized location. We've added new filters for different file types, ensuring you can pinpoint exactly what you're looking for and with the date filter, you can narrow down your search results to find files created or modified within a specific timeframe. We understand that searching within a folder or document library is important to you, and for that, we have simplified scoping options that will enable precise searches within folders, sites, or document libraries. We've also visually updated the interface with more metadata, ensuring you effortlessly identify the right files every time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Security settings in the Microsoft Edge management service
CurrentVersion.description: The Microsoft Edge management service will provide admins with a dedicated experience to manage specific settings that help improve the security posture of their managed browser instances.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Security settings in the Microsoft Edge management service
OldVersion.description: The Microsoft Edge management service will provide admins with a dedicated experience to manage specific settings that help improve the security posture of their managed browser instances.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Topic Subscription notification
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows users to subscribe to notifications for Viva Engage topics they follow. Users would receive a Teams and Engage bell notification whenever a new post is tagged with a topic they are subscribed to or the topic is added to an existing post.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Topic Subscription notification
OldVersion.description: This feature allows users to subscribe to notifications for Viva Engage topics they follow. Users would receive a Teams and Engage bell notification whenever a new post is tagged with a topic they are subscribed to or the topic is added to an existing post.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Graph: Graph API - Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage will be added to the Microsoft Graph API, allowing for the creation of customized reporting and analytics. Metrics included in the Graph API will match those available in the Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage report in the Microsoft 365 admin center, including tenant-level count of enabled users and active users, as well as last activity date per user (all up and per Microsoft 365 app).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Graph: Graph API - Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage
OldVersion.description: Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage will be added to the Microsoft Graph API, allowing for the creation of customized reporting and analytics. Metrics included in the Graph API will match those available in the Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage report in the Microsoft 365 admin center, including tenant-level count of enabled users and active users, as well as last activity date per user (all up and per Microsoft 365 app).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private Line on Teams Phone Devices
CurrentVersion.description: Teams phone devices will support Private line, a new functionality for Teams Phone that allows you to enable a private second phone number for a select set of users so they can receive inbound calls directly, by passing delegates, admins, or assistants. Calls to the private line are distinguished by a unique notification and ringtone.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private Line on Teams Phone Devices
OldVersion.description: Teams phone devices will support Private line, a new functionality for Teams Phone that allows you to enable a private second phone number for a select set of users so they can receive inbound calls directly, by passing delegates, admins, or assistants. Calls to the private line are distinguished by a unique notification and ringtone.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: People app on Teams Phone Devices
CurrentVersion.description: An updated People app on Teams phone devices will provide a simplified and faster experience to help users manage contacts easily.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: People app on Teams Phone Devices
OldVersion.description: An updated People app on Teams phone devices will provide a simplified and faster experience to help users manage contacts easily.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Explicit consent recording meeting policy support on Teams Phone Devices
CurrentVersion.description: When explicit consent recording meeting policy is applied, a notification will pop-up when the recording or transcription is initiated requesting consent of participants on Teams phone devices.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Explicit consent recording meeting policy support on Teams Phone Devices
OldVersion.description: When explicit consent recording meeting policy is applied, a notification will pop-up when the recording or transcription is initiated requesting consent of participants on Teams phone devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Scoped and targeted device clean up rule
CurrentVersion.description: This enables IT admins to clean up inactive devices from their tenant by providing capabilities of running these rules at a platform level.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Scoped and targeted device clean up rule
OldVersion.description: This enables IT admins to clean up inactive devices from their tenant by providing capabilities of running these rules at a platform level.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Export Q&A Questions
CurrentVersion.description: Event organizers can now export questions that attendees asked as a .csv file to better understand the questions asked and general sentiment in a town hall or webinar.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Export Q&A Questions
OldVersion.description: Event organizers can now export questions that attendees asked as a .CSV file, in order to better understand the questions asked and general sentiment in a meeting or event.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Users can scope suggestions to specific entities in the new Outlook for Windows and Web
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to scope their search suggestions down to specific entities such as Files, People, Mail etc in order to sort through their suggestions more easily. They will be able to navigate from the suggestion directly to the entity tab in their search results. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Users can scope suggestions to specific entities in the new Outlook for Windows and Web
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to scope their search suggestions down to specific entities such as Files, People, Mail etc in order to sort through their suggestions more easily. They will be able to navigate from the suggestion directly to the entity tab in their search results. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Emoji picker in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Enhance your posts in Viva Engage with the integrated emoji picker. No need to memorize shortcuts; just click the emoji icon in the command bar to express yourself with ease.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Emoji picker in Viva Engage
OldVersion.description: Enhance your posts in Viva Engage with the integrated emoji picker. No need to memorize shortcuts; just click the emoji icon in the command bar to express yourself with ease.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Adding search to settings on Outlook for Android
CurrentVersion.description: We recently rolled out updated settings on Outlook for Android. To make the settings experience even better, we are now adding the ability to search within settings so that you can find exactly what you're looking for.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Adding search to settings on Outlook for Android
OldVersion.description: We recently rolled out updated settings on Outlook for Android. To make the settings experience even better, we are now adding the ability to search within settings so that you can find exactly what you're looking for.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel support for formula data summaries in rows and cells
CurrentVersion.description: Add a single formula to summarize column data into one cell. Today, full column calculations produce a unique result in each row, but this new feature gives you the option to calculate all data in a column together to return one result. You can also create a row with formulas that apply for relevant columns; for example, an "add total sales row" will add a SUM formula underneath every column that has sales data.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel support for formula data summaries in rows and cells
OldVersion.description: Add a single formula to summarize column data into one cell. Today, full column calculations produce a unique result in each row, but this new feature gives you the option to calculate all data in a column together to return one result. You can also create a row with formulas that apply for relevant columns; for example, an "add total sales row" will add a SUM formula underneath every column that has sales data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Longer documents can be summarized in chat
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Word will be able to completely summarize documents that it could only partially summarize before. The upper limit is increasing to about four times more words.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Longer documents can be summarized in chat
OldVersion.description: Copilot in Word will be able to completely summarize documents that it could only partially summarize before. The upper limit is increasing to about four times more words.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross-platform meetings via SIP join for Teams Rooms
CurrentVersion.description: Joining SIP-based conferencing services like Google Meet, Zoom, Cisco Webex, and others via Teams Rooms offers a seamless collaboration experience, mirroring the native Teams interface. This integration supports features such as 1080p video, dual screen, various layout options, HDMI input, and others contingent on the third-party platform's in-meeting controls. A SIP calling plan from a CVI partner, currently Pexip, is necessary. This is available for Teams Rooms customers with a Pro license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross-platform meetings via SIP join for Teams Rooms
OldVersion.description: Joining SIP-based conferencing services like Google Meet, Zoom, Cisco Webex, and others via Teams Rooms offers a seamless collaboration experience, mirroring the native Teams interface. This integration supports features such as 1080p video, dual screen, various layout options, HDMI input, and others contingent on the third-party platform's in-meeting controls. A SIP calling plan from a CVI partner, currently Pexip, is necessary. This is available for Teams Rooms customers with a Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Dynamic video tile resizing based on occupancy count from Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The room video tile dynamically adjusts size based on the number of people in the room. When one person is in the room, the tile matches the remote participant's size. With two or more people, the room tile expands to be four times larger. Admins can enable or disable the people count feature.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Room video tile re-sizing based on people count for Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: Using people count information, the room video tile is dynamically re-sized in Gallery view. If there is only one user in the room, the video tile will be the same size as the remote participant tile. If there is more than one user in the room, the room video tile will be 4x the size of the remote participant tile. Admins will be available to turn on/off the people count capability.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Use sensitivity labels in Microsoft 365 apps when connected experiences are disabled
CurrentVersion.description: Your organization can now disable connected experiences for privacy concerns without impacting data security policies such as sensitivity labels. Services associated with Microsoft Purview (e.g. sensitivity labels and rights management) are no longer controlled by policy settings to manage privacy controls for Microsoft 365 Apps. Instead, these services will rely on their existing security admin controls in Purview portals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Use sensitivity labels in Microsoft 365 apps when connected experiences are disabled
OldVersion.description: Your organization can now disable connected experiences for privacy concerns without impacting data security policies such as sensitivity labels. Services associated with Microsoft Purview (e.g. sensitivity labels and rights management) are no longer controlled by policy settings to manage privacy controls for Microsoft 365 Apps. Instead, these services will rely on their existing security admin controls in Purview portals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: EDU tenant type selection in policy wizard
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select tenant type for their institution from the policy wizard. This setting can be changed anytime from the wizard.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: EDU tenant type selection in policy wizard
OldVersion.description: Admins can now select tenant type for their institution from the policy wizard. This setting can be changed anytime from the wizard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Playlist Card on Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows tenant admins to create a card for a playlist to be accessed from the Viva Connections Dashboard.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Playlist Card on Viva Connections Dashboard
OldVersion.description: This feature allows tenant admins to create a card for a playlist to be accessed from the Viva Connections Dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Add an account to Outlook mobile using a QR code
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft is simplifying how users can add their Microsoft 365 for work or school accounts to Outlook mobile by allowing them to use a QR code instead of typing their username and password. We are cancelling this feature and apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Add an account to Outlook mobile using a QR code
OldVersion.description: Microsoft is simplifying how users can add their Microsoft 365 for work or school accounts to Outlook mobile by allowing them to use a QR code instead of typing their username and password. This experience will roll out first to Outlook on the web. From there, users will see a new button in Help labeled “Outlook mobile." Once they click it, a QR code will appear. Users can scan the QR code from within Outlook mobile following the steps for "Add account" to add their account without the need to type their usernames and passwords.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: New enhancements to Restricted access control using Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Entra security groups
CurrentVersion.description: Restricted access control (RAC) is a premium security policy that lets admins restrict access to SharePoint and OneDrive resources to a specific set of users configured using Microsoft 365 or Entra Security groups. As part of this change, new capabilities will be added to review the impact of RAC application using insights reports and additional options to configure the policy will be made available. Also, policy enforcement visibility will be extended to Site owners via SharePoint sites.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: New enhancements to Restricted access control using Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Entra security groups
OldVersion.description: Restricted access control (RAC) is a premium security policy that lets admins restrict access to SharePoint and OneDrive resources to a specific set of users configured using Microsoft 365 or Entra Security groups. As part of this change, new capabilities will be added to review the impact of RAC application using insights reports and additional options to configure the policy will be made available. Also, policy enforcement visibility will be extended to Site owners via SharePoint sites.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook mobile
CurrentVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience available in new Outlook for Windows, web, and classic Outlook soon will be available in Microsoft Outlook for iOS and Android through the module switcher.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook mobile
OldVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience available in new Outlook for Windows, web, and classic Outlook soon will be available in Microsoft Outlook for iOS and Android through the module switcher.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: View PDFs with Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels on OneDrive Mobile
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, OneDrive users can open PDF files that are protected with Microsoft Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels and read them using OneDrive mobile apps in read-only mode. Only authorized users will be able to access these PDF files.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: View PDFs with Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels on OneDrive Mobile
OldVersion.description: With this capability, OneDrive users can open PDF files that are protected with Microsoft Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels and read them using OneDrive mobile apps in read-only mode. Only authorized users will be able to access these PDF files.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva for AI Transformation pre-built campaign in Viva Amplify
CurrentVersion.description: Pre-drafted publications, campaign objectives and key messages designed to communicate how to leverage Microsoft Viva for AI transformation.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva for AI Transformation pre-built campaign in Viva Amplify
OldVersion.description: Pre-drafted publications, campaign objectives and key messages designed to communicate how to leverage Microsoft Viva for AI transformation.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Document library card for Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: This card will help operators add a card which will show all the files inside a directory for quick access.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Sensitivity label support for town hall and webinars (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will now allow event organizers to set sensitivity labels for town halls and webinars. These labels are visible to organizers when creating an event instance once selected, and notify organizers if the details of the event being created are not valid for the selected sensitivity.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Sensitivity label support for town hall and webinars (Premium)
OldVersion.description: This feature will now allow event organizers to set sensitivity labels for town halls and webinars. These labels are visible to organizers when creating an event instance once selected, and notify organizers if the details of the event being created are not valid for the selected sensitivity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- New scenario based policy templates
CurrentVersion.description: We are adding two additional pre-configured quick policy templates for crown jewel protection and email exfiltration for admins that want to deploy scenario specific policy templates with little configurations needed to get started faster. These templates are in addition to the existing data leak and data theft quick policies. All 4 scenario based quick policies can be found in the Policies page> Create Policies. Additional tuning post deployment to meet individual alert volume needs can be expected. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- New scenario based policy templates
OldVersion.description: We are adding two additional pre-configured quick policy templates for crown jewel protection and email exfiltration for admins that want to deploy scenario specific policy templates with little configurations needed to get started faster. These templates are in addition to the existing data leak and data theft quick policies. All 4 scenario based quick policies can be found in the Policies page> Create Policies. Additional tuning post deployment to meet individual alert volume needs can be expected. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports – Suggested candidates for Microsoft 365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: A new column will be added to the Readiness section of the Microsoft 365 Copilot Usage report showing suggested candidates for Microsoft 365 Copilot. This new column is intended to help admins with licensing decisions by quickly identifying users who are in a strong position to get the most value from Microsoft 365 Copilot based on their relevant Microsoft 365 app usage.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports – Suggested candidates for Microsoft 365 Copilot
OldVersion.description: A new column will be added to the Readiness section of the Microsoft 365 Copilot Usage report showing suggested candidates for Microsoft 365 Copilot. This new column is intended to help admins with licensing decisions by quickly identifying users who are in a strong position to get the most value from Microsoft 365 Copilot based on their relevant Microsoft 365 app usage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Language expansion coming in M365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: The Copilot for Microsoft 365 team is working on supporting 12 new languages across all M365 Copilot features: Bulgarian, Croatian, Estonian, Greek, Indonesian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Romanian, Serbian (Latin), Slovak, Slovenia, and Vietnamese. They're also improving the handling of these language variants: Dutch (Belgium), German (Switzerland), English (UK), Spanish (Mexico), and French (Canada).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Language expansion coming in M365 Copilot
OldVersion.description: The Copilot for Microsoft 365 team is working on supporting 12 new languages across all M365 Copilot features: Bulgarian?, Croatian?, Estonian?, Greek?, Indonesian?, Latvian?, Lithuanian?, Romanian?, Serbian (Latin)?, Slovak?, Slovenia,? and Vietnamese. They're also improving the handling of these language variants: Dutch (Belgium), German (Switzerland), English (UK), Spanish (Mexico), and French (Canada).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New collaborative Project Studio environment in Microsoft Mesh
CurrentVersion.description: The Project Studio environment is a new space for immersive meetings and Mesh events. This space has been designed for synchronous teamwork and productivity for small groups to collaborate on content. Collaboration tools like whiteboards will be added to the environment as they become available.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New collaborative Project Studio environment in Microsoft Mesh
OldVersion.description: The Project Studio environment is a new space for immersive meetings and Mesh events. This space has been designed for synchronous teamwork and productivity for small groups to collaborate on content and use whiteboards and other tools together in the virtual environment.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Host and attendee interaction visibility for multi-room Mesh events
CurrentVersion.description: Mesh event attendees can now see raised hands and reactions from attendees in other rooms during large, multi-room Mesh events. This creates a greater sense of audience feedback as a whole across all rooms in a Mesh event and increases total audience engagement.  Additionally, event hosts will now be able to move between all rooms in a multi-room Mesh event.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Host and attendee interaction visibility for multi-room Mesh events
OldVersion.description: Mesh event attendees can now see raised hands and reactions from attendees in other rooms during large, multi-room Mesh events. This creates a greater sense of audience feedback as a whole across all rooms in a Mesh event and increases total audience engagement.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Real-time notifications (Live Activities) for Teams meetings on iOS lock screen
CurrentVersion.description: iOS Live Activities integration for Teams meetings on mobile allows users to view the live progress of a meeting at-a-glance from their lock screen. Real-time notifications with Live Activities automatically update in real-time so users can see when the meeting has started, when it’s in progress, whether recording is on, when someone needs to be admitted from the lobby, and when the meeting has ended. Live Activities is for iPhones only (iOS16.1).

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Work Hours and Location in My Day
CurrentVersion.description: Work Hours and Location information will now be available in My Day pane in Outlook when using agenda view. Users will be able to update their Work Hours and Location information from My Day and also see who is coming to Office. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New security and certification information available for apps and extensions
CurrentVersion.description:
This feature will equip administrators evaluating apps and
copilot extensions for deployment with extensive security and related certification data to help those admins more quickly evaluate that an app and/or extension complies with their tenant security requirements. Initially, the information provided will include results
from individual M365 certification tests and evidence submitted by ISVs during
Microsoft's audit of their app or copilot extension. Additionally, for
non-certified apps, admins will receive details on data handling, security, and
compliance as self-attested by the ISV.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Introducing archival and other enforcement actions with inactive site lifecycle management policy
CurrentVersion.description: Address inactive content on your tenant with inactive sites policy. Admins can configure policies to Detect inactive sites, send notifications to all site owners, and archive these sites or put them in a read-only state if there is no action from notification recipients.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Graph Connectors in CIQ
CurrentVersion.description: When grounding your prompts in BizChat, you will be able to use CIQ to scope to your 3P data from your Graph Connectors.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Search - query suggestions
CurrentVersion.description: Now you can form search queries quickly and efficiently with enhanced people-query suggestions. Start typing a person name in the search bar, and get recommendations based on results most relevant to you.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection- User Message Recall in Outlook for encrypted messages
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Advanced Message Encryption will support Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature for encrypted messages in Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection- User Message Recall in Outlook for encrypted messages
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Advanced Message Encryption will support Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature for encrypted messages in Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voice and Face biometric data export controls
CurrentVersion.description: This new feature provides controls for biometric data export for users. To ensure security and protection of user privacy, individuals can export their own biometric data limiting risk of download or sharing by tenant administrators.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Participant roster grouping in Teams BYOD meeting rooms
CurrentVersion.description: When participants join a Teams meeting with their laptop in bring your own device (BYOD) meeting rooms, they will appear in the ‘in-room’ participant section of the roster enabling individual identification and meeting intelligence capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Support for PowerPoint live within Cloud Video Interop (CVI)
CurrentVersion.description: This new functionality will provide CVI Partners with the ability to display still images when PowerPoint live content is being presented within a Microsoft Teams meeting. The PowerPoint presentation will then be displayed as video content, this will not include animations or embedded videos.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Mesh app on PC supports guest access for events
CurrentVersion.description: Attendees can now join Mesh events as a guest in the Microsoft Mesh app on PC. Event organizers can invite guest users outside their organization, providing an opportunity for broader collaboration and networking in Mesh events. Guests can sign in to Mesh app to join events, participate in discussions, and experience the same interactive features as internal users, all while maintaining secure access control. Guest access for events in the Mesh app on Quest and support for anonymous participants will be supported in a future update.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Drag emails into Calendar icon in the app bar to create an event
CurrentVersion.description: Users can drag and drop emails into the Calendar icon on the left app bar of Outlook to create an event. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center:  Group Driven Membership Management
CurrentVersion.description: This feature is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate.  With this in-product feature support, end users and admins will be able to add other groups as member of a Dynamic Microsoft 365 Group by using the memberOf property. In the preview, users will be able to create these GDM a.k.a nested groups from Azure Portal & Group Card and they can be accessed & used like any other Dynamic Microsoft 365 Group across apps like Teams, Outlook & SharePoint. Enhancements around deeper levels of nesting, increasing the number of memberOf groups in a tenant are also being worked on and will be eventually available for GA.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center:  Group Driven Membership Management
OldVersion.description: With this in-product feature support, end users and admins will be able to add other groups as member of a Dynamic Microsoft 365 Group by using the memberOf property. In the preview, users will be able to create these GDM a.k.a nested groups from Azure Portal & Group Card and they can be accessed & used like any other Dynamic Microsoft 365 Group across apps like Teams, Outlook & SharePoint. Enhancements around deeper levels of nesting, increasing the number of memberOf groups in a tenant are also being worked on and will be eventually available for GA.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Data loss prevention (DLP) support for trainable classifiers (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Trainable classifiers can be added as a condition for data loss prevention (DLP) policies, and enhanced templates and default policies will leverage trainable classifiers. Additionally, classifier-related information and alerts will appear within Activity explorer.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Data loss prevention (DLP) support for trainable classifiers (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: Trainable classifiers can be added as a condition for data loss prevention (DLP) policies, and enhanced templates and default policies will leverage trainable classifiers. Additionally, classifier-related information and alerts will appear within Activity explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Reset People Suggestions in Search
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows settings. If a reset is done, all versions of Outlook will reflect the change. Note: The release month and status have been updated to show current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Reset People Suggestions in Search
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows settings. If a reset is done, all versions of Outlook will reflect the change. Note: The release month and status have been updated to show current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Estimating the Cost of Optical Character Recognition (OCR) for Exchange Online, Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, OneDrive and EndPoint
CurrentVersion.description: With OCR cost estimator, without incurring any bill and without providing azure subscription, admins will be able to estimate how much they will pay once they turn “ON” the OCR configuration for the selected locations and scope.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Sort search results by ratings
CurrentVersion.description: Users can sort in-app search results by ratings and relevance of the content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Viva App Bar integration in Viva Learning Webapp
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Learning Webapp will have an easy way to switch across other Viva Webapp modules.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Spell check in Viva Learning search
CurrentVersion.description: User queries will be spell checked and corrected for all in-app Search.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) trainable classifiers
CurrentVersion.description: Leverage trainable classifiers from Microsoft Information Protection (MIP) to recognize various content types specific to your organization. Insider Risk Management in Microsoft 365 correlates various signals from the chip to the cloud to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Global exclusions
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, all exclusion features currently found under intelligent detections will be relocated to a new tab labeled "Global exclusions" within the insider risk settings. All previously added exclusions in intelligent detections will be migrated to this new tab.
The functionality of exclusions remains unchanged. Moreover, admins with appropriate permissions can now add exclusion via defined detection groups, which contain similar entities like domains or file types. This new tab is designed to enhance usability and offers a convenient way to access and manage exclusions.
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning – Multilayer structuring, customization, and branding for learning academies
CurrentVersion.description: This feature set brings new functionality to learning academies. Multi-layer structuring allows users to organize content and learning paths under multiple levels. Branding capabilities include the customization of the academy logo and the background image. Customization allows users to hide or show individual components of an academy like featured sets and  learner profile cards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning -  Use the Egress API to access all “My Learning” records
CurrentVersion.description: The Egress API can be used by learners to view their My Learning records and corresponding course details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Add links to content in featured set
CurrentVersion.description: Global administrators/knowledge administrators can now add links to content sets in Viva Learning. These links can direct users to content stored internally with services like SharePoint and Stream or found online through YouTube, Vimeo, and other sources. The capability to add links to content allows admins to add content found online to featured sets, in addition to formal learning courses from connected providers.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Schedule from email with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Often you may want to transition a conversation from an email thread to a meeting. Copilot helps you do this by being able to start scheduling right from the email conversation. It saves you time and effort by generating a meeting invite that's ready for you to review and send. When you click on "Schedule with Copilot" a meeting form will appear with a Copilot generated meeting title, agenda, and conversation summary as well as a pre-filled attendee list from the email thread and an attachment of the original email thread. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows, web, Mac, and mobile. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Customize your Viva Connections experiences with fonts and themes
CurrentVersion.description:
Site owners and operators will now be able to create branded fonts and themes for their sites and experiences in the brand center by combining the branding assets that the organization provides or by creating their own. 

This feature has been cancelled at this time. We apologize for any inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive for Business available in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Users can find and use the OneDrive app in classic Outlook for Windows, for a consistent and fast experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Date and numeral standardization
CurrentVersion.description: All the dates that appear in Viva Learning will match the layout local to the user. This also applies to standardization of numerals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove recommendations in Recommended to You
CurrentVersion.description: This gives users the ability to remove the recommendations which they do not need in the Recommended to you section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove learning objects shown in In-progress section
CurrentVersion.description: Users can remove learning objects shown in the In-progress section.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows - Search tasks using Microsoft To Do
CurrentVersion.description: Search across your tasks lists using the Microsoft To Do module in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Restrict unintentional sharing to unallowed cloud apps and services (macOS)
CurrentVersion.description: Ability to restrict unintentional sharing of sensitive items to unallowed cloud apps and services in macOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Granular exclusion
CurrentVersion.description: Granular exclusion allows admins to adjust and fine tune indicators according to organizational preferences to help tailor the detection of risks that may lead to a potential security incident. For example, admins can configure the indicator “sending email with attachments to recipients outside the organization” to only detect emails sent to personal domains (e.g. outlook.com). In that way, admins can reduce the number of false positives. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of webinars to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Town Halls
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of town halls to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Attach files from SharePoint Sites in the mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to browse, multiselect and attach files from SharePoint Sites to a chat or channel conversation in the mobile app.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Find your files faster than ever with a new and improved search experience in OneDrive Web
CurrentVersion.description: OneDrive for web now lets you find your files faster than ever with a new and improved search functionality. Say goodbye to the days of endlessly scrolling through folders to find that one elusive document. With our latest update, locating your files is now faster and more intuitive than ever before. Whether it's in your personal OneDrive, shared folders, or document libraries, our improved search feature allows you to seamlessly sift through your digital workspace from one centralized location. We've added new filters for different file types, ensuring you can pinpoint exactly what you're looking for and with the date filter, you can narrow down your search results to find files created or modified within a specific timeframe. We understand that searching within a folder or document library is important to you, and for that, we have simplified scoping options that will enable precise searches within folders, sites, or document libraries. We've also visually updated the interface with more metadata, ensuring you effortlessly identify the right files every time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Security settings in the Microsoft Edge management service
CurrentVersion.description: The Microsoft Edge management service will provide admins with a dedicated experience to manage specific settings that help improve the security posture of their managed browser instances.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Topic Subscription notification
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows users to subscribe to notifications for Viva Engage topics they follow. Users would receive a Teams and Engage bell notification whenever a new post is tagged with a topic they are subscribed to or the topic is added to an existing post.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Topic Subscription notification
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows users to subscribe to notifications for Viva Engage topics they follow. Users would receive a Teams and Engage bell notification whenever a new post is tagged with a topic they are subscribed to or the topic is added to an existing post.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Graph: Graph API - Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage will be added to the Microsoft Graph API, allowing for the creation of customized reporting and analytics. Metrics included in the Graph API will match those available in the Copilot for Microsoft 365 usage report in the Microsoft 365 admin center, including tenant-level count of enabled users and active users, as well as last activity date per user (all up and per Microsoft 365 app).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private Line on Teams Phone Devices
CurrentVersion.description: Teams phone devices will support Private line, a new functionality for Teams Phone that allows you to enable a private second phone number for a select set of users so they can receive inbound calls directly, by passing delegates, admins, or assistants. Calls to the private line are distinguished by a unique notification and ringtone.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: People app on Teams Phone Devices
CurrentVersion.description: An updated People app on Teams phone devices will provide a simplified and faster experience to help users manage contacts easily.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Explicit consent recording meeting policy support on Teams Phone Devices
CurrentVersion.description: When explicit consent recording meeting policy is applied, a notification will pop-up when the recording or transcription is initiated requesting consent of participants on Teams phone devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Scoped and targeted device clean up rule
CurrentVersion.description: This enables IT admins to clean up inactive devices from their tenant by providing capabilities of running these rules at a platform level.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Export Q&A Questions
CurrentVersion.description: Event organizers can now export questions that attendees asked as a .csv file to better understand the questions asked and general sentiment in a town hall or webinar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Export Q&A Questions
CurrentVersion.description: Event organizers can now export questions that attendees asked as a .csv file to better understand the questions asked and general sentiment in a town hall or webinar.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Users can scope suggestions to specific entities in the new Outlook for Windows and Web
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to scope their search suggestions down to specific entities such as Files, People, Mail etc in order to sort through their suggestions more easily. They will be able to navigate from the suggestion directly to the entity tab in their search results. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Emoji picker in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Enhance your posts in Viva Engage with the integrated emoji picker. No need to memorize shortcuts; just click the emoji icon in the command bar to express yourself with ease.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Adding search to settings on Outlook for Android
CurrentVersion.description: We recently rolled out updated settings on Outlook for Android. To make the settings experience even better, we are now adding the ability to search within settings so that you can find exactly what you're looking for.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel support for formula data summaries in rows and cells
CurrentVersion.description: Add a single formula to summarize column data into one cell. Today, full column calculations produce a unique result in each row, but this new feature gives you the option to calculate all data in a column together to return one result. You can also create a row with formulas that apply for relevant columns; for example, an "add total sales row" will add a SUM formula underneath every column that has sales data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Longer documents can be summarized in chat
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Word will be able to completely summarize documents that it could only partially summarize before. The upper limit is increasing to about four times more words.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cross-platform meetings via SIP join for Teams Rooms
CurrentVersion.description: Joining SIP-based conferencing services like Google Meet, Zoom, Cisco Webex, and others via Teams Rooms offers a seamless collaboration experience, mirroring the native Teams interface. This integration supports features such as 1080p video, dual screen, various layout options, HDMI input, and others contingent on the third-party platform's in-meeting controls. A SIP calling plan from a CVI partner, currently Pexip, is necessary. This is available for Teams Rooms customers with a Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Dynamic video tile resizing based on occupancy count from Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The room video tile dynamically adjusts size based on the number of people in the room. When one person is in the room, the tile matches the remote participant's size. With two or more people, the room tile expands to be four times larger. Admins can enable or disable the people count feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Use sensitivity labels in Microsoft 365 apps when connected experiences are disabled
CurrentVersion.description: Your organization can now disable connected experiences for privacy concerns without impacting data security policies such as sensitivity labels. Services associated with Microsoft Purview (e.g. sensitivity labels and rights management) are no longer controlled by policy settings to manage privacy controls for Microsoft 365 Apps. Instead, these services will rely on their existing security admin controls in Purview portals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: EDU tenant type selection in policy wizard
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select tenant type for their institution from the policy wizard. This setting can be changed anytime from the wizard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Playlist Card on Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows tenant admins to create a card for a playlist to be accessed from the Viva Connections Dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Add an account to Outlook mobile using a QR code
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft is simplifying how users can add their Microsoft 365 for work or school accounts to Outlook mobile by allowing them to use a QR code instead of typing their username and password. We are cancelling this feature and apologize for any inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: New enhancements to Restricted access control using Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Entra security groups
CurrentVersion.description: Restricted access control (RAC) is a premium security policy that lets admins restrict access to SharePoint and OneDrive resources to a specific set of users configured using Microsoft 365 or Entra Security groups. As part of this change, new capabilities will be added to review the impact of RAC application using insights reports and additional options to configure the policy will be made available. Also, policy enforcement visibility will be extended to Site owners via SharePoint sites.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook mobile
CurrentVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience available in new Outlook for Windows, web, and classic Outlook soon will be available in Microsoft Outlook for iOS and Android through the module switcher.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: View PDFs with Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels on OneDrive Mobile
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, OneDrive users can open PDF files that are protected with Microsoft Purview Information Protection sensitivity labels and read them using OneDrive mobile apps in read-only mode. Only authorized users will be able to access these PDF files.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva for AI Transformation pre-built campaign in Viva Amplify
CurrentVersion.description: Pre-drafted publications, campaign objectives and key messages designed to communicate how to leverage Microsoft Viva for AI transformation.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Document library card for Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: This card will help operators add a card which will show all the files inside a directory for quick access.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Sensitivity label support for town hall and webinars (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will now allow event organizers to set sensitivity labels for town halls and webinars. These labels are visible to organizers when creating an event instance once selected, and notify organizers if the details of the event being created are not valid for the selected sensitivity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- New scenario based policy templates
CurrentVersion.description: We are adding two additional pre-configured quick policy templates for crown jewel protection and email exfiltration for admins that want to deploy scenario specific policy templates with little configurations needed to get started faster. These templates are in addition to the existing data leak and data theft quick policies. All 4 scenario based quick policies can be found in the Policies page> Create Policies. Additional tuning post deployment to meet individual alert volume needs can be expected. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports – Suggested candidates for Microsoft 365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: A new column will be added to the Readiness section of the Microsoft 365 Copilot Usage report showing suggested candidates for Microsoft 365 Copilot. This new column is intended to help admins with licensing decisions by quickly identifying users who are in a strong position to get the most value from Microsoft 365 Copilot based on their relevant Microsoft 365 app usage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Language expansion coming in M365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: The Copilot for Microsoft 365 team is working on supporting 12 new languages across all M365 Copilot features: Bulgarian, Croatian, Estonian, Greek, Indonesian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Romanian, Serbian (Latin), Slovak, Slovenia, and Vietnamese. They're also improving the handling of these language variants: Dutch (Belgium), German (Switzerland), English (UK), Spanish (Mexico), and French (Canada).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New collaborative Project Studio environment in Microsoft Mesh
CurrentVersion.description: The Project Studio environment is a new space for immersive meetings and Mesh events. This space has been designed for synchronous teamwork and productivity for small groups to collaborate on content. Collaboration tools like whiteboards will be added to the environment as they become available.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Host and attendee interaction visibility for multi-room Mesh events
CurrentVersion.description: Mesh event attendees can now see raised hands and reactions from attendees in other rooms during large, multi-room Mesh events. This creates a greater sense of audience feedback as a whole across all rooms in a Mesh event and increases total audience engagement.  Additionally, event hosts will now be able to move between all rooms in a multi-room Mesh event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Real-time notifications (Live Activities) for Teams meetings on iOS lock screen
CurrentVersion.description: iOS Live Activities integration for Teams meetings on mobile allows users to view the live progress of a meeting at-a-glance from their lock screen. Real-time notifications with Live Activities automatically update in real-time so users can see when the meeting has started, when it’s in progress, whether recording is on, when someone needs to be admitted from the lobby, and when the meeting has ended. Live Activities is for iPhones only (iOS16.1).

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Work Hours and Location in My Day
CurrentVersion.description: Work Hours and Location information will now be available in My Day pane in Outlook when using agenda view. Users will be able to update their Work Hours and Location information from My Day and also see who is coming to Office. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Work Hours and Location in My Day
CurrentVersion.description: Work Hours and Location information will now be available in My Day pane in Outlook when using agenda view. Users will be able to update their Work Hours and Location information from My Day and also see who is coming to Office. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows
